discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C. Line 07 contains an inline comment.
D. Lines 01 through 04 will be ignored for syntax checking.

choices.A: The string in Line 06 will be interpreted as a comment.
choices.B: The pond sign (#) is optional for lines 02 and 03.
choices.D: Lines 01 through 04 will be ignored for syntax checking.
